title: Pizzazz
lyrics:
You know sometimes they ask me
Who do I do it for?
You see I do it for the Jane Fonda’s
The Michelle Obama’s
The Brandi Love’s
The Sofia Vergara’s (Mhm)

And the Mrs. Incredibles

Ha, that Mrs. Incredible



Aye so I pull up in this b***h go stupid

Hit the p***y once now it’s love like Cupid (Whoa!)

I’m the youngest Minnesotan makin’ movement

Ya b***h chose me cause she’s with the improvements

Aye pull up to the function

Spontaneous combustion (Splash!)

Gravy 6’6″, y’all a bunch of a fuckin’ munchkins

I ain’t touch yo b***h, cause she smellin’ like some onions

And there ain’t no fuckin’ way you see me going near that dungeon

B***h I got the sauce like I’m Bob fuckin’ Avage

Yo b***h got the slurp like 7-Eleven

I’m gettin’ more kick than a thicc b***h’s weddin’

The beat leave you sweatin’

My wrist leave you sleddin’ (Aye)



Aye, I don’t got the drip (Drip!)

I got the splash!

I don’t make rap

B***h I make smooth jazz!

I don’t got swag

I got Pizzazz!

Yo momma on my d**k cause I look like ya dad

I don’t got the drip (Drip!)

I got the splash!

Versuri-lyrics.info

I don’t make rap

B***h I make smooth jazz!

I don’t got swag

I got Pizzazz!

Yo mom tryna date cause I look like ya dad



I’m sippin’ Piseco

I’m lookin’ perfecto

I just met a thiccy

I’m tryna fineggle

So leggo my eggo

In the Winnebago

My b***h is getting thicc like Hansel & Gretel

Menace like I’m Dennis

Naked with yo b***h playin’ tennis

Still fuckin’ postin’ with ya dentist!

And I run off with yo b***h like a run-on sentence

Now I’m drunk jet skiing with Ellen DeGeneres

My s**t goin’ brazy

I’m pumpin’ the A/C

They sayin’ “Hey Gravy

Why you so wavy?

Why you so tasty?

Crispy like pastries?”

I don’t really know

But I think I’m Pat Swayze!



Aye, I don’t got the drip (Drip!)

I got the splash! (Splash!)

I don’t make rap

B***h I make smooth jazz!

I don’t got swag

I got Pizzazz!

Yo momma on my d**k cause I look like ya dad

Hey, I don’t got the drip (Drip!)

I got the splaaaash!

I don’t make rap

B***h I make smooth jazz!

I don’t got steam

I got Pizzaaazz!

MILF’s tryna f**k cause a look like a dad

Aye I don’t got a splish (Splish!)

I got a splash (Splash!)

I don’t fuckin’ rap

B***h I make smooth jazz! (smooth jazz)

I don’t got swag

I’m a dad!

Gravy in this b***h

With the fuckin’ Pizzazz!



B***h!

Oh baby Gravyyy!
